verses.verse: וּכְהִתְפַּלֵּ֤ל <S%H6419><s%> had prayed עֶזְרָא֙ <S%H5830><s%> Now when Ezra וּכְ֨הִתְוַדֹּת֔וֹ <S%H3034><s%> and when he had confessed בֹּכֶה֙ <S%H1058><s%> weeping וּמִתְנַפֵּ֔ל <S%H5307><s%> and casting himself down לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God נִקְבְּצוּ֩ <S%H6908><s%> there assembled אֵלָ֨יו <S%H413><s%> to him מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> unto him out of Israel קָהָ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> congregation רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> great מְאֹ֗ד <S%H3966><s%> a very אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H582><s%> of men וְנָשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> and women וִֽילָדִ֔ים <S%H3206><s%> and children כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָכ֥וּ <S%H1058><s%> wept הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> for the people הַרְבֵּה־ <S%H7235><s%> very בֶֽכֶה׃ <S%H1059><s%> sore ס

וַיַּעַן֩ <S%H6030><s%> answered שְׁכַנְיָ֨ה <S%H7935><s%> And Shechaniah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְחִיאֵ֜ל <S%H3171><s%> of Jehiel מִבְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> [one] of the sons [עֹולָם כ] (עֵילָם֙ <S%H5867><s%> Elam ק) וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לְעֶזְרָ֔א <S%H5830><s%> unto Ezra אֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <S%H587><s%> we מָעַ֣לְנוּ <S%H4603><s%> We have trespassed בֵאלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> against our God וַנֹּ֛שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and have taken נָשִׁ֥ים <S%H802><s%> wives נָכְרִיּ֖וֹת <S%H5237><s%> strange מֵעַמֵּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> of the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וְעַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> now יֵשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yet now there is מִקְוֶ֥ה <S%H4723><s%> hope לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> spite זֹֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> So

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> now נִֽכְרָת־ <S%H3772><s%> Now therefore let us make בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant לֵ֠אלֹהֵינוּ <S%H430><s%> with our God לְהוֹצִ֨יא <S%H3318><s%> to put away כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נָשִׁ֜ים <S%H802><s%> all the wives וְהַנּוֹלָ֤ד <S%H3205><s%> and such as are born מֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> according בַּעֲצַ֣ת <S%H6098><s%> of them according to the counsel אֲדֹנָ֔י <S%H113><s%> master וְהַחֲרֵדִ֖ים <S%H2730><s%> and of those that tremble בְּמִצְוַ֣ת <S%H4687><s%> at the commandment אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God וְכַתּוֹרָ֖ה <S%H8451><s%> according to the law יֵעָשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> and let it be done

ק֛וּם <S%H6965><s%> Arise כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָלֶ֥יךָ <S%H5921><s%> is your responsibility הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> for [this] matter וַאֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> ourselves עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> will be with חֲזַ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> [belongeth] unto thee we also [will be] with thee be of good courage וַעֲשֵֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> and do פ

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> Then arose עֶזְרָ֡א <S%H5830><s%> Ezra וַיַּשְׁבַּ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> to swear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרֵי֩ <S%H8269><s%> and made the chief הַכֹּהֲנִ֨ים <S%H3548><s%> priests הַלְוִיִּ֜ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel לַעֲשׂ֛וֹת <S%H6213><s%> that they should do כַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> according to this word הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> to this וַיִּשָּׁבֵֽעוּ׃ <S%H7650><s%> And they sware

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up עֶזְרָ֗א <S%H5830><s%> Then Ezra מִלִּפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> from before בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into לִשְׁכַּ֖ת <S%H3957><s%> into the chamber יְהוֹחָנָ֣ן <S%H3076><s%> of Johanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶלְיָשִׁ֑יב <S%H475><s%> of Eliashib וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went שָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there לֶ֤חֶם <S%H3899><s%> no bread לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor אָכַל֙ <S%H398><s%> thither he did eat וּמַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> water לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor שָׁתָ֔ה <S%H8354><s%> nor drink כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for מִתְאַבֵּ֖ל <S%H56><s%> for he mourned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over מַ֥עַל <S%H4604><s%> because of the transgression הַגּוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1473><s%> of them that had been carried away ס

וַיַּעֲבִ֨ירוּ <S%H5674><s%> made ק֜וֹל <S%H6963><s%> A proclamation בִּיהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> throughout Judah וִירֽוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem לְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> to all בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto all the children הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> of the captivity לְהִקָּבֵ֖ץ <S%H6908><s%> that they should gather themselves together יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> unto Jerusalem

וְכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָב֜וֹא <S%H935><s%> And that whosoever would not come לִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> within three הַיָּמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> days כַּעֲצַ֤ת <S%H6098><s%> according to the counsel הַשָּׂרִים֙ <S%H8269><s%> of the princes וְהַזְּקֵנִ֔ים <S%H2205><s%> and the elders יָחֳרַ֖ם <S%H2763><s%> should be forfeited כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רְכוּשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7399><s%> all his substance וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> himself יִבָּדֵ֖ל <S%H914><s%> and himself separated מִקְּהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> from the congregation הַגּוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1473><s%> of those that had been carried away ס

וַיִּקָּבְצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> gathered themselves together כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <S%H376><s%> the men יְהוּדָה֩ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֨ן ׀ <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> unto Jerusalem לִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> within three הַיָּמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> days ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he חֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַתְּשִׁיעִ֖י <S%H8671><s%> It [was] the ninth בְּעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> on the twentieth בַּחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month וַיֵּשְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> sat כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people בִּרְחוֹב֙ <S%H7339><s%> in the street בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God מַרְעִידִ֥ים <S%H7460><s%> trembling עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> because of [this] matter וּמֵהַגְּשָׁמִֽים׃ <S%H1653><s%> and for the great rain פ

וַיָּ֨קָם <S%H6965><s%> stood up עֶזְרָ֤א <S%H5830><s%> And Ezra הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> the priest וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> You מְעַלְתֶּ֔ם <S%H4603><s%> unto them Ye have transgressed וַתֹּשִׁ֖יבוּ <S%H3427><s%> and have taken נָשִׁ֣ים <S%H802><s%> wives נָכְרִיּ֑וֹת <S%H5237><s%> strange לְהוֹסִ֖יף <S%H3254><s%> to increase עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto אַשְׁמַ֥ת <S%H819><s%> the trespass יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now תְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> Now therefore make תוֹדָ֛ה <S%H8426><s%> confession לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> of your fathers וַעֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> and do רְצוֹנ֑וֹ <S%H7522><s%> his pleasure וְהִבָּֽדְלוּ֙ <S%H914><s%> and separate מֵעַמֵּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> yourselves from the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַנָּשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> wives הַנָּכְרִיּֽוֹת׃ <S%H5237><s%> and from the strange

וַיַּֽעְנ֧וּ <S%H6030><s%> answered כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַקָּהָ֛ל <S%H6951><s%> Then all the congregation וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> and said ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> with a loud כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> after that [כְּדִבְרֶיךָ כ] (כִּדְבָרְךָ֥ <S%H1697><s%> act ק) עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> is our duty לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> so must we do

אֲבָ֞ל <S%H61><s%> But הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> the people רָב֙ <S%H7227><s%> [are] many וְהָעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> and [it is] a time גְּשָׁמִ֔ים <S%H1653><s%> of much rain וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> are not כֹּ֖חַ <S%H3581><s%> and we are not able לַעֲמ֣וֹד <S%H5975><s%> to stand בַּח֑וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without וְהַמְּלָאכָ֗ה <S%H4399><s%> neither [is this] a work לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor לְי֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> of one וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor לִשְׁנַ֔יִם <S%H8147><s%> or two כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִרְבִּ֥ינוּ <S%H7235><s%> for we are many לִפְשֹׁ֖עַ <S%H6586><s%> that have transgressed בַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> in this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

יַֽעֲמְדוּ־ <S%H5975><s%> stand נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Let שָׂ֠רֵינוּ <S%H8269><s%> Let now our rulers לְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הַקָּהָ֞ל <S%H6951><s%> of all the congregation וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> those בֶּעָרֵ֗ינוּ <S%H5892><s%> in our cities הַהֹשִׁ֞יב <S%H3427><s%> and let all them which have taken נָשִׁ֤ים <S%H802><s%> wives נָכְרִיּוֹת֙ <S%H5237><s%> strange יָבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> come לְעִתִּ֣ים <S%H6256><s%> times מְזֻמָּנִ֔ים <S%H2163><s%> at appointed וְעִמָּהֶ֛ם <S%H5973><s%> together זִקְנֵי־ <S%H2205><s%> and with them the elders עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> of every city וָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> city וְשֹׁפְטֶ֑יהָ <S%H8199><s%> and the judges עַ֠ד <S%H5704><s%> until לְהָשִׁ֞יב <S%H7725><s%> be turned חֲר֤וֹן <S%H2740><s%> thereof until the fierce אַף־ <S%H639><s%> wrath אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H430><s%> of our God מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> account לַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> for this matter הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> of this פ

אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> Only יוֹנָתָ֧ן <S%H3129><s%> Only Jonathan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֲשָׂהאֵ֛ל <S%H6214><s%> of Asahel וְיַחְזְיָ֥ה <S%H3167><s%> and Jahaziah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son תִּקְוָ֖ה <S%H8616><s%> of Tikvah עָמְד֣וּ <S%H5975><s%> were employed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> with וּמְשֻׁלָּ֛ם <S%H4918><s%> about this [matter] and Meshullam וְשַׁבְּתַ֥י <S%H7678><s%> and Shabbethai הַלֵּוִ֖י <S%H3881><s%> the Levite עֲזָרֻֽם׃ <S%H5826><s%> helped

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> did so כֵן֮ <S%H3651><s%> so בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children הַגּוֹלָה֒ <S%H1473><s%> of the captivity וַיִּבָּדְלוּ֩ <S%H914><s%> were separated עֶזְרָ֨א <S%H5830><s%> And Ezra הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֲנָשִׁ֨ים <S%H376><s%> men רָאשֵׁ֧י <S%H7218><s%> chief הָאָב֛וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> after the house אֲבֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers וְכֻלָּ֣ם <S%H3605><s%> all בְּשֵׁמ֑וֹת <S%H8034><s%> and all of them by [their] names וַיֵּשְׁב֗וּ <S%H3427><s%> and sat down בְּי֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> in the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָעֲשִׂירִ֔י <S%H6224><s%> of the tenth לְדַרְי֖וֹשׁ <S%H1875><s%> to examine הַדָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> the matter

וַיְכַלּ֣וּ <S%H3615><s%> And they made an end בַכֹּ֔ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲנָשִׁ֕ים <S%H376><s%> the men הַהֹשִׁ֖יבוּ <S%H3427><s%> that had taken נָשִׁ֣ים <S%H802><s%> wives נָכְרִיּ֑וֹת <S%H5237><s%> strange עַ֛ד <S%H5704><s%> against י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> by the first לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרִאשֽׁוֹן׃ <S%H7223><s%> of the first פ

וַיִּמָּצֵא֙ <S%H4672><s%> there were found מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And among the sons הַכֹּהֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who הֹשִׁ֖יבוּ <S%H3427><s%> that had taken נָשִׁ֣ים <S%H802><s%> wives נָכְרִיּ֑וֹת <S%H5237><s%> strange מִבְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> [namely] of the sons יֵשׁ֤וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> of Jeshua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֽוֹצָדָק֙ <S%H3136><s%> of Jozadak וְאֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren מַֽעֲשֵׂיָה֙ <S%H4641><s%> Maaseiah וֶֽאֱלִיעֶ֔זֶר <S%H461><s%> and Eliezer וְיָרִ֖יב <S%H3402><s%> and Jarib וּגְדַלְיָֽה׃ <S%H1436><s%> and Gedaliah
